features: ✨【Modern Industrial Small Lamp】Onewish short mini table lamp has a sleek metal base with mesh iron art lampshade, offers a perfect blend of modern simplicity and industrial charm. This small Lamp's design ensuring unparalleled stability.

✨【Small Lamp for Small Space】This compact yet chic design desk lamp fits seamlessly in living rooms, bedrooms, studies, or dining rooms, even in a relatively narrow corner. Enhancing your home without taking up excessive space.

✨【Energy-saving Bulb Included】Our tiny side table lamp comes with a complimentary E12 bulb (UL-certified). No dazzle or buzzing, this bulb can emit the same level of illumination as the 40W incandescent bulb does while saving up to 90% energy.
✨【Easy to Install & Portable】Each minimalist lamp is Lightweight and easy assembly, enabling convenient portability for optimal illumination in different areas.
✨【Worry-Free After-Sales Service】Enjoy a 1-year warranty and 24-hour customer support with our metal table lamp, ensuring a delightful journey of captivating lighting experiences.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: ONEWISH Small Metal Table Lamps - Gold

Are you currently looking for a durable Small table lamp?ONEWISH's tiny industrial table lamp would be a good choice for you. This simple table lamp has unique metal base serves as the lamp body, complemented by a smooth and comfortable metal mesh lampshade, with an ON/OFF switch ,a perfect blend of modern simplicity and industrial charm. The small table Lamp's four-legged design ensures unparalleled stability, combining functionality with aesthetic appeal. even accidental drops won't lead to deformation or breakage, usage without concerns. This stylish metal lamp boasts wide applicability, fiting into your living room, bedroom, office, or dining area, elevating your home's aesthetics without taking up excessive space.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I've enjoyed the ambiance it brings to my bedroom and appreciate the thoughtfulness design.
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. Having recently incorporated the ONEWISH Small Table Lamp into my home, I've had a delightful experience with this elegant and functional piece. Here's a personal review based on my usage:Sleek and Modern Design:The first thing that caught my eye was the lamp's sleek and modern design. The combination of a metal base and a hollowed fabric lampshade not only makes it aesthetically pleasing but also adds a touch of sophistication to my bedside table.Perfect Size for Bedside Table:The lamp's size is just right for a bedside table or a small desk. It doesn't take up too much space, making it ideal for those looking to add a stylish lighting element without overwhelming the room.Warm and Cozy Lighting:The included 2700K LED bulb emits a warm and cozy light that's perfect for creating a relaxing ambiance in the bedroom. The fabric lampshade provides a soft diffusion of light, making it suitable for reading or winding down before sleep.Easy to Assemble:Setting up the lamp was a breeze. The base and lampshade are separate components, and assembly took just a few minutes. The lampshade securely attaches to the base, and the included LED bulb easily screws into place.Hollowed Fabric Design:The hollowed fabric design of the lampshade adds a unique and artistic element to the lamp. When the lamp is turned on, the pattern created by the hollowed fabric becomes more pronounced, casting interesting shadows in the room.Sturdy Construction:The lamp feels sturdy and well-built. The metal base provides stability, and the lampshade is made of quality fabric. It gives the impression of a durable and long-lasting piece.Convenient On/Off Switch:The lamp features a convenient on/off switch located on the cord. This is a practical design choice, as it allows for easy access to the switch without having to reach for the bulb.Versatile Placement:While I initially placed the lamp on my bedside table, its versatile design means it could easily find a home on a living room side table, a home office desk, or any other space where a touch of stylish illumination is desired.Conclusion:The ONEWISH Small Table Lamp is a delightful addition to any space that requires a touch of modern elegance. Its sleek design, warm lighting, and versatile placement options make it a versatile choice for various rooms in the home. Whether for bedside reading or creating a cozy atmosphere in the living room, this lamp effortlessly combines form and function. I've enjoyed the ambiance it brings to my bedroom and appreciate the thoughtfulness put into its design.

reviews.reviewText: Had a small shelf I wanted a lamp on. The height of these tiny lamps make them perfect for the space.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Industrial Table Lamp
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. The structure is made of sleek, black metal that emits an industrial beauty that works well with either contemporary or retro furnishings and accessories. When lit, the delicate ironwork on the lampshade creates mesmerizing shadows that make the piece itself a work of art in and of itself. Not only is it light, but it also serves as a topic of discussion. It casts a light that is both warm and welcoming, which is just what I need to make my living area seem more like a home. I like that the light bulb uses little energy and stays lit for a long time since it lowers my monthly power cost and saves me the trouble of having to change light bulbs often. The adaptability of this light is one of the features that I like most about purchasing it. It would work well as a bedside table, a nightstand, or even as an accent piece on a table in the corridor because of its size. Reading or establishing an atmosphere conducive to relaxation and tranquility may be accomplished with the help of the lamp since it emits exactly the perfect quantity of light. In addition to this, I like how the on/off switch has been thoughtfully placed on the cable so that it is simple to use.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 6, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. This modern lamp has the option of one or two lights and is available in a few different colors. I just needed one. It's a sleek, industrial black metal that matches my desk accessories flawlessly. It's an item that surely grabs other's attention when they walk into my office due to its unique design.This lamp is both a work of beauty and a source of inviting light. It uses a bright, energy-efficient, low-energy bulb that reduces electricity costs. I like how readily available and easily accessible the on/off switch is on the wire. The lamp is visually pleasing, useful, stylish, and fairly priced.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I LOVE LAMP!
reviews.reviewText: This is the perfect little lamp to go next to my couch in the living room! I love the desn of the shade, and the edison bulb plus the shape of the stand make this look really modern. Just look at how it makes my living room look! Perfect soft glow. I freaking love this little thing. The cord could be slightly longer, and it's just a switch on and off (which means I can use it with a smart plug - unlike the touch lamps). But for $10 (I got the hollowed 1 pack) this is a slam dunk 5/5!

I recently got those lamps for our bedroom and we couldn't be happier. Assembly is a breeze, and the included E12 bulbs emit a warm orange/yellow, cozy light. Despite a minor base issue in one lamp, overall quality and durability are impressive. The on/off switch is easily reachable on the cord and the compact size make them fit in most place and the slick design make them fit in most places. Tldr, a five-star recommendation for their functionality, aesthetics, and quality.

I like a lot about this lamp: it's got a simple look at can fit into multiple spaces, it has the on/off switch on the cord (I tend to prefer that over lamps with the switch directly on the lamp), and it puts off quite a nice light.... that being said, the light is very bright directly in its area yet doesn't seem to travel out very far from the point of origin. It lights nicely around itself but the light doesn't reach out very far to the other parts of the room it's in. Now it is advertised as a bedside lamp so this makes a certain sense since you're not really using it to light a room, just directly next to the bed area, but I figured I would mention it for anyone thinking this could be used in a more living-type space. Otherwise it's a cute lamp and works as promised.

What an attractive little bedside lamp this is! It’s the perfect size for smaller bedside tables and yet is mighty enough to light the whole room with the included lightbulb! The light is warm toned and not that awful blueish tone that wakes you up! The holes in the cream color shade are a nice touch that serves a nice visual interest on the wall. The wire base is a pretty gold color and compliments the shade nicely. This is really quite a pretty lamp and I’m glad I ordered. It is on the smaller side for a lamp but was perfect for what I needed it for!

This lamp is adorable! I'm not huge into cutesy little things like this usually but this lamp is just a little too adorable for me not to totally fall in love with it.It is a little thing, part of why it's so cute. The lampshade has a hole pattern in it which allows light to shine through. It's enough light that you could read beside this thing if you wanted to, but not too much light that it's obnoxious. Perfect for what I wanted.The lamp itself is quite easy to assemble once you've got it all out of the package. There's a slip on the lamp that reminds you of the order of operations. Yes, there is a procedure to putting it together but you'll pretty much do it once and that'll be it.There's an on/off switch in the cord which is nice. I'd hate to see how they'd integrate the switch onto the body of the lamp. That would be horribly inconvenient with how small the lamp is. So the switch placement is good. The cord is quite long too, about what you'd expect for a normal-sized lamp. Very nice too that the bulb is included so you have everything you need to enjoy your new lamp as soon as you receive it and put it together. For $29.99 CDN at the time of this review, it won't bankrupt you to put one of these babies in your room either.Overall this lamp is so charming that I know you'll fall in love with it like I did. It's small and simple but it's totally cute and totally functional, and it's been a joy having it brighten up my space. 5/5 would definitely recommend👌

I recently added a touch of sophistication to my living spaces with the Small Table Lamp featuring a metal base in a calming gray hue, and it has become a stylish addition to my bedside table. This nightstand lamp, thoughtfully designed for the bedroom, living room, or home office, comes with a 3000K LED bulb included, offering a range of benefits that seamlessly blend functionality with modern aesthetics.Let's start with the positives. The Small Table Lamp exudes understated elegance with its metal base in a tranquil gray finish, making it a versatile addition to various interior styles. The compact size is perfect for bedside tables or desks, providing ample illumination without overwhelming the space. The included 3000K LED bulb emits a warm and inviting glow, creating a cozy ambiance for relaxation or focused work.The thoughtful design extends to the metal base, adding stability and a touch of contemporary flair to the lamp. The on/off switch provides convenient control, ensuring easy operation. The gray color scheme makes it easy to integrate the lamp into existing decor themes, adding a subtle yet impactful element to the room.The lamp's versatility makes it suitable for various settings, from bedside reading to accent lighting in the living room or a functional desk lamp in the home office. The inclusion of the LED bulb ensures energy efficiency and longevity, aligning with modern eco-conscious considerations.While the benefits are substantial, there are a couple of minor considerations. Users should be mindful of the lamp's compact size and choose an appropriate location for optimal lighting coverage. Additionally, as with any light fixture, occasional cleaning may be required to maintain its pristine appearance.In conclusion, the Small Table Lamp with a Metal Base in Tranquil Gray is a delightful addition for those seeking a blend of style and functionality in their lighting fixtures. Its modern design, warm LED illumination, and versatile placement options make it a practical and aesthetically pleasing choice for enhancing the ambiance of bedrooms, living rooms, and home offices. The minor considerations are easily managed and are overshadowed by the overall elegance and charm this table lamp brings to my living spaces.
